title: ChestCommands插件打开CreditShop点券商店时无反应
author: 吱吱君

replies.author: ws17909
replies.txt_content: 楼上正解，打开另外种界面需要加上Keep-Open:ture

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
打开gui菜单的命令有特殊的选项
楼主要不去原帖看看
我记得好像是
Keep-Open:ture

replies.author: ws17909
replies.txt_content:
格式大概这样：
dianquan：
   COMMAND: 'cshop open'
   NAME: '&9[+] 点劵商店 [+]'
   LORE: 
      - '&a打开点劵商店'
   ID： 264
   POSITION-X: 4
   POSITION-Y: 2
   Keep-Open:ture

replies.author: 吱吱君
replies.txt_content:
ws17909 发表于 2016-1-2 18:45
格式大概这样：
以解决，不过放在最后一行面板无法打开，放在ID之后解决

replies.txt_content:
